answers.answer: They got be checking my sugar four times a day and taking a low dose pill at night because my morning numbers wasn't low enough. Its a pain but its whats best. You should be okay. Good luck :-)
Follow the diet they will give you and avoid sweets and sugary drinks.
I had it with my first.. I didn't have to take medication  but everything was good my numbers were always good when I checked myself.

Same here failed both and they started checking my sugars 4x a day at first but I was able to drop down to 2x a day because of good sugars. It not fun but you'll learn what yoy can and can't eat just remember it'll be worth once your little one arrives.
Im crying now bcoz now I need to watch wat I eat..grrrr!plus I think I need to get my test everyday grrrr!im so sad.. :(

question: I found out that I have gestational diabetes..I failed one hr test and 3 hrs test!my result is 144 and the reference range is 139 grrr!any advise mommies..thanks!
title: sad :(
